availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky clerk. Lexington, Kentucky native. Son of Nathaniel Shaw and Emma Marsh Shaw. Clerk in Lexington, Fayette County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Hay, Thomas Arthur. 1911. Martin genealogy ; descendants of Lieutenant Samuel Martin of Withersfield Conn. showing descent from royalty,p. 124.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 370
Find A Grave, "Hiram Shaw (1835-1897)," Memorial #98130849, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/98130849 (accessed January 7, 2019).
